meanings.definition: The scientific study of the relationships between plants and their environment.
meanings.sent1: Phytosociologies explores how plants interact with their surroundings to thrive.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in phytosociologies investigate how environmental factors impact plant growth.
meanings.sent3: The humorous side of phytosociologies is seeing plants 'communicate' with their environment.
